overview:
Sean is an entrepreneur and student; he is currently pursuing his B.S in Computer Science with a minor in Economics at Harvard.

In adjunct with his academics, Sean has extensive technology associated experience and currently serves as a systems and business development consultant in Boston, MA. Sean is a dedicated, hard working and motivated self-starter with over six years of hands on experience in web application development using PHP and MySQL. In addition he is passionate about front end UI design; and has experience creating a enjoyable using experience coding in HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

Sean has extensive background knowledge in computer systems and the latest in web technologies, as well as the usage of social media in marketing and helping to create a brand image for entrepreneur and business owners.

In addition to his studies and current work position he is also researching and writing a thesis paper on Quantum Cryptography and how recent progress in advanced computing technology is changing the world of security, and how business firms handle and manage sensitive data.
